attrib:
+ 65 Damage
+ 6 HP Regeneration
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
CLEAVE DAMAGE: 35%
notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.Cleave damage goes through magic immunity.
desc: Passive: Cleave - Deals a percent of attack damage in a 250 AoE around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.
lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.
